modName: Mirz's NPC Replacer Narri and Tekla
summary: This mod edits Narri and her sister Tekla in Falkreath
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][font=Verdana][size=4][center]
Mirz's NPC Replacer Narri and Tekla[/center][center][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2]
[/size][/font][/size][/center][/size][/font][/b][/size][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][center]Description
===========

This mod edits [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Narri]Narri[/url][url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Zaria][/url] and her sister [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Tekla]Tekla[/url] in Falkreath.
They looked weird to me, so I tried to make them a bit prettier (not supermodels but a bit nicer)


Details
=======

Narri:[u]
[/u]
-New custom skin and face textures, eyes, brows and hair
-Edited face shape
-Forwarded edits from USLEEP

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83702-0-1494102197.png[/img]

Tekla:[u]
[/u]
-New custom skin and face textures, eyes, and brows
-I also gave her new hairstyle, but then I decided not to remove the hat.
 So you won't see the new hair unless you remove the hat.
-Edited face shape

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83702-1-1494102197.png[/img]

Please add screenshots and come back to endorse if you like my mod :)


Incompatibility
===============

Conflict with mods that edits Narri or Tekla.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================

Let me know if you find any bugs, so I can try to fix them.


Requirements
============

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]USLEEP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] (esp not needed)
[size=3][font=Verdana][size=2]Any body replacer that works with UNP textures
[/size][/font][/size][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2](Check sticky post in comments for a workaround if you use CBBE)[/size][/size][/size][/size]

History
=======

1.0 06.05.2017 - Initial release
1.1 02.11.2017 - Fixed texture problem with Tekla's face
